fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Observe a player's house at night, seeing everyone who visits them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Once per game, you may appoint someone you have seen visiting as US Senator. This secretly gives them 1 extra vote.
- Much like this server, there is no competitive election to elect the senator. You just appoint someone at your own discretion *cough cough 1984*
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose the Sentries.
